value.stringValue: "1) To validate authenticity of the chip project, FAE must conduct on-site support for;"&SUBSTITUTE($Label.NewLine, "-", "")& "2) Design review, analysis and testing "&SUBSTITUTE($Label.NewLine, "-", "")& "3) Product performance validation and verification"&SUBSTITUTE($Label.NewLine, "-", "")& "4) Update support activity and Case in SF"&SUBSTITUTE($Label.NewLine, "-", "")& "5) Report if customer wanted to use u-blox chip to build clone modules."&SUBSTITUTE($Label.NewLine, "-", "")

formulas.name: formula_18_myRule_16_A1_0277572355
formulas.expression: "1) To validate authenticity of the chip project, FAE must conduct on-site support for;"&SUBSTITUTE({!$Label.NewLine}, "-", "")& "2) Design review, analysis and testing "&SUBSTITUTE({!$Label.NewLine}, "-", "")& "3) Product performance validation and verification"&SUBSTITUTE({!$Label.NewLine}, "-", "")& "4) Update support activity and Case in SF"&SUBSTITUTE({!$Label.NewLine}, "-", "")& "5) Report if customer wanted to use u-blox chip to build clone modules."&SUBSTITUTE({!$Label.NewLine}, "-", "")

value.stringValue: "1) Check all price (SPR, RSP, TSP, Minimum Price, Quotation Price) & QTY vs end customer’s PO price & QTY."&SUBSTITUTE($Label.NewLine,"-","")& "2) Check document quality (no fake or duplicate, ensure Company Stamp & Signature are in different place for repeat orders)."&SUBSTITUTE($Label.NewLine,"-","")& "3) Check whether FAE support delivered (check Activity History)"&SUBSTITUTE($Label.NewLine,"-","")& "4) Check and confirm Distributor’s end customer’ PO with end customer directly, esp for SPR price."&SUBSTITUTE($Label.NewLine,"-","")& "5) Check “Commitment Agreement” signed and is attached in SF Account page. (Action by Account Manager)"&SUBSTITUTE($Label.NewLine,"-","")& "6) Check: Customer - to send 3-month FCST to our sales and upload to SF. (Action by Account Manager)"&SUBSTITUTE($Label.NewLine,"-","")

formulas.name: formula_3_myRule_1_A1_5844765050
formulas.expression: "1) Check all price (SPR, RSP, TSP, Minimum Price, Quotation Price) & QTY vs end customer’s PO price & QTY."&SUBSTITUTE({!$Label.NewLine},"-","")& "2) Check document quality (no fake or duplicate, ensure Company Stamp & Signature are in different place for repeat orders)."&SUBSTITUTE({!$Label.NewLine},"-","")& "3) Check whether FAE support delivered (check Activity History)"&SUBSTITUTE({!$Label.NewLine},"-","")& "4) Check and confirm Distributor’s end customer’ PO with end customer directly, esp for SPR price."&SUBSTITUTE({!$Label.NewLine},"-","")& "5) Check “Commitment Agreement” signed and is attached in SF Account page. (Action by Account Manager)"&SUBSTITUTE({!$Label.NewLine},"-","")& "6) Check: Customer - to send 3-month FCST to our sales and upload to SF. (Action by Account Manager)"&SUBSTITUTE({!$Label.NewLine},"-","")
